atk-abh03a37:2_3: tasmā atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:5_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a37:5_7: Atha naṁ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti,
atk-abh03a37:5_10: Sato sampajānoti idaṁ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṁ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a37:8_2: Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:8_7: Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṁ karonti.
atk-abh03a37:8_8: Iti naṁ iminā atthena codetuṁ evamāha.
atk-abh03a37:8_9: Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a37:8_11: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha.
atk-abh03a37:11_2: Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṁ mātukucchiyaṁ vasitvā nikkhantaṁ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:11_7: dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a37:11_12: kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṁ satisampajaññānaṁ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a37:14_2: Tattha acirajātānaṁ pana sotāpannānaṁ arahattappattiṁ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṁ gabbhaṁ
atk-abh03a37:14_3: disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti
atk-abh03a37:14_4: ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti ca idhāpi yesaṁ laddhiyo,
atk-abh03a37:17_4: sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṁ supinagatassa cittaṁ abyākata”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:17_9: Supinagatassa cittaṁ abbohārikanti idaṁ āpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:17_10: Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṁ pavattati,
atk-abh03a37:17_11: vatthuvikopanaṁ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṁ paññapetuṁ.
atk-abh03a37:20_3: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṁ āsevati nāma.
atk-abh03a37:20_5: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṁ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:20_9: Atha naṁ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṁ nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṁ.
atk-abh03a37:23_4: Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṁ bhijjati,
atk-abh03a37:23_5: eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:23_9: Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṁ tathā saṇṭhānaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a37:23_11: cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṁyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:23_12: Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a37:23_15: Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti yasmā niccā na honti,
atk-abh03a37:23_16: tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṁ vadati.
